The data will become available for download after the embargo period.*;neuroscience;3D cell morphological reconstruction data;english;dataset;The Human Brain Project;DeFelipe, Javier;Benavides-Piccione, Ruth;Fernaud, Isabel;Kastanauskaite, Asta;Regalado, Mamen;Gonzalez-Tapia, Silvia;Leon, Gonzalo;Cano, Deborah;Rojo, Concepcion.;Benavides-Piccione, Ruth;Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International;https://doi.org/10.1093/cercor/bhj041
name: 2c27eae4-2956-5c62-8c61-78ac0b75d1a1
notes:
We have produced 3D reconstructions of pyramidal neurons from the mouse somatosensory cortex across layers II-VI using Neurolucida software from 3D confocal stack of images. Data from 3D reconstructions will be useful to modeling and integration of anatomical data with functional studies in mouse brain. 

**Embargo status:** *This dataset is temporarily under embargo. The data will become available for download after the embargo period.*
title: 3D reconstructions of pyramidal neurons from the mouse cortex
